attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: give back to the people a labour party that belongs to the people that made it   labour means just that a party that looks after the working class not a second class tory middle blue collar vote salary orientated extortionists.who made you? not the pretenters but the workers who built this party by giving there lives go back to the roots,or you will loose

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
